things Falco runs audits multiple times a day in multiple conditions so that you
can get the full picture of your website of your users independently of where
they are or the device they use or the browser they use other network
conditions they have folker also plots the evolution of performance metrics so
if you have Falco enabled and you see a sudden spike in your maybe time to interactive then you may pause and take

this sudden spike that made my users wait three to four seconds more on my

like a new graph can negatively impact performance and so it's fair that the
product team should know about the trade-offs of adding new features versus
having an impact on performance Falco can also tests both individual URLs say
your landing page or entire user journeys if you have a customer funnel
